Summary: Strange object refecting sunlight hovering stationary above frederick for aprox ten minutes.
divs: sighting detailsi was approaching the city of frederick when i noticed something that didn't look like a plane or helicopter in the sky. it was completely stationary for approximately ten minutes before slowly moving off and out of site. during the ten minutes i got the impression that it was metallic and was reflecting the light from the sun. the object slowly faded from sight several times during my observations, but reappeared in the same spot. i only moved about 3\4 of a mile during my viewing because i was stuck in traffic. i only wish i was able to get closer, so i would have gotten a better id.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Frederick
There was one other sighting in Frederick on or around April 18th 2008
